title: Kita Usahakan Rumah Itu
overview: Amel and her lover, Iko, plan to revisit Amel's childhood home. However, when they arrived there, they found the house had been turned into a sewing shop. After asking permission from the shop owner, Amel and Iko entered. Inside, Amel tried hard to remember every corner of the room, comparing it with memories of her old house while telling Iko.
